thread.title: Watch substitute Pablo Armero twerk on the sideline after Juan Cuadrado's goal for Colombia
thread.title_full: Watch substitute Pablo Armero twerk on the sideline after Juan Cuadrado's goal for Colombia

title: Watch substitute Pablo Armero twerk on the sideline after Juan Cuadrado's goal for Colombia
text:
Mar 28, 2017 at 6:08p ET 0Shares 
There hasn’t been much to dance about for Colombia in World Cup qualifying so far, but things are looking up for Los Cafeteros. They got a crucial three points against Bolivia in their last match, and were up 2-0 against Ecuador at halftime after James Rodriguez and Juan Cuadrado put them ahead. 
Cuadrado’s goal to double the advantage really had Colombia in a dancing mood, and everybody in the team was happy to see his tap-in roll over the line. 
Especially Pablo Armero.
